name: 3D Systems Corporation
description: 3D Systems Corporation is a leading provider of 3D printing solutions, dedicated to advancing the field of additive manufacturing. Founded in 1986 by Chuck Hull, the inventor of stereolithography, the company has been at the forefront of the 3D printing revolution, offering a wide range of 3D printers, materials, and services. 3D Systems caters to a variety of industries, including aerospace, healthcare, automotive, and consumer products, enabling manufacturers to innovate and optimize their production processes. The company’s portfolio includes advanced technologies like selective laser sintering (SLS), multi-jet printing (MJP), and metal 3D printing systems. 3D Systems also provides comprehensive software solutions for design and production, ensuring a seamless workflow from concept to final product. A strong emphasis on research and development allows 3D Systems to continually enhance its offerings, making it a trusted partner for businesses looking to harness the potential of 3D printing. With a commitment to sustainability, the company strives to reduce material waste and energy consumption in manufacturing processes, positioning itself as a forward-thinking leader in the industry. 3D Systems' mission is to transform industries and improve lives through innovative 3D solutions.
